attributes.action: Stop discrimination on women for being a mum
attributes.additional_details: Discrimination is happening world wide,experience,research,getting to the route of where and who and what it's about. To end all forms of discrimination. Is to expose the truth,The truth is the only way to win any argument,to prove a point,to answer any question,solve a puzzle,just being a mum has taken me to practically every form of discrimination out there,having to fight for a right that's mine by nature.for my story sign now and I will tell the world.
